Attendee Converter module¶

Module that converts attendee records between formats.

Can convert between Pandas DataFrame and proprietary AttendeeManager

Todo

  • Implement functions

  • Implement datalogging

attendee_converter.pandas2manager(attendees: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, ignore: Optional[set] = None) → src.attendees.attendee_manager.AttendeeManager[source]¶

Convert Pandas DataFrame attendee record to AttendeeManager.

Parameters

  • attendees (pd.DataFrame) – The attendees as a Pandas DataFrame.

  • ignore (set) – Collection of attributes to ignore, if left as None will not ignore any fields.

Returns

The attendees as a AttendeeManager.

Return type

AttendeeManager

attendee_converter.manager2pandas(attendees: src.attendees.attendee_manager.AttendeeManager, ignore: Optional[set] = None) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame[source]¶
